So, to convert the Java String to a byte[] in the generateSignature() method, you can use the String.getBytes() method and specify the Charset.forName("UTF-8") as the second parameter. This will convert the string to bytes using the UTF-8 character encoding.

public static String generateSignature(String secrete, String pathAndQuery){
String encoded = null;
try {
MessageDigest md = MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-256");
md.update(secrete.getBytes("UTF-8"));
md.update(pathAndQuery.getBytes("UTF-8"));
byte[] digest = md.digest();
encoded = Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(digest);
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
return encoded;
}
